definition: to carry/to convey/to load/to hold/to fill up/and/also/as well as/simultaneously
to record in writing/to carry (i.e. publish in a newspaper etc)/Taiwan pr. [zai4]/year

sentences.english: Hard-handoff is the only way for those different carriers to achieve handoff.
sentences.chinese: 對於不同載頻之間的切換，只能採用硬切換實現。

sentences.english: Due to the single transmission of pure pilot-frequency, by doing so it can reduce carrier interference where pseudo-pilot lies in.
sentences.chinese: 由於只發射純導頻，對僞導頻所在的載頻的干擾減小。
